title: Why the attack on Fed Chair Jerome Powell follows Donald Trump's typical playbook — and isn't going to stop there
full_text: Why the attack on Fed Chair Jerome Powell follows Donald Trump's typical playbook — and isn't going to stop there. The Federal Reserve is supposed to be independent from the president. The Justice Department investigation into Jerome Powell could change that.. Trump takes questions from the press on board Air Force One.Samuel Corum/Getty Images <ul><li>Donald Trump wants Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to do his bidding. Powell says he's independent.<… [+4552 chars]
